id.description: Globally unique identifier for the Flow

version.description: String formatted PTP timestamp (<seconds>:<nanoseconds>) indicating precisely when an attribute of the resource last changed

label.description: Freeform string label for the Flow

format.description: Format of the data coming from the Flow as a URN

tags.description: Key value set of freeform string tags to aid in filtering Flows. Values should be represented as an array of strings. Can be empty.

source_id.description: Globally unique identifier for the Source which initially created the Flow

parents.description: Array of UUIDs representing the Flow IDs of Grains which came together to generate this Flow (may change over the lifetime of this Flow)
